title: Introducing: Krusoe
content:
There’s a unassuming funkiness that underpins S.

O.S, the debut track from Krusoe – an almost swagger that develops as the track builds. Merging classical influences with more contemporary, electronic inspirations, there’s enough of a pop edge for it to be addictive and accessible, whilst also feeling like Krusoe is carving out a sound uniquely his own. S.O.S. is the first of hopefully much more to come. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
